summary: A disgraced ex-policeman who runs a small ring of prostitutes finds himself in a race against time when one of his women goes missing.
cast: Yoon-seok Kim|Jung-woo Ha|Yeong-hie Seo|Yoo-Jeong Kim|In-gi Jeong|Hyo-ju Park|Bon-woong Ko|Duk-je Cho|Seong-kwang Ha|Deok-jae Jo|Yeong-Seon Kim|Jong-goo Lee|Sang-hee Lee|Yeon-ah Oh|Moo-yeong Yeo
title: The Chaser
